channel.title: Features that didn't make the cut
channel.description: Well, hopefully this is the right section. Was there anything previewed/showcased/mentioned before release that isn't present in the game or has been changed since first sight? I'm not talking about minor things, but something important. Things like level design and such logically change during the development process, so that's obvious, but in gaming, some planned features have to be cut for any reason sometimes, any example with BM?

item.title: Features that didn't make the cut
item.dc:creator: ysrael214
item.description:
You can’t use tripmines for speedruns anymore.

Read full topic

item.source: Features that didn't make the cut

item.title: Features that didn't make the cut
item.dc:creator: Dotard
item.description:
Mr. Someguy:

HECU Zombies, not really cut, but there’s a spot in the code where they would be.

HECU Commander having his own voice. Instead all Soldiers share his voice, and only the Medic uses the young voice (originally the young voice was for everyone, and the gruff for the Commander)

HECU Soldiers avoiding trip mines, turns out they don’t, at all.

HECU Sentries having 360º rotation, they only have 180º rotation

Interesting, kinda lol’d at the last two points _^

Read full topic
item.source: Features that didn't make the cut

HECU Sentries having 360º rotation, they only have 180º rotation

item.title: Features that didn't make the cut
item.dc:creator: xalener
item.description:
AI cockroaches.

Also to be fair, the mod is called Black Mesa, and that’s where it all takes place. Xen isn’t in the BMRF, so it’s not in Black Mesa Source.

item.title: Features that didn't make the cut
item.dc:creator: Dotard
item.description:
TehBoxNoob:

Some NPC’s in AM.

Even though that’s not a deal breaker, more variants (actual new models instead of re-textures) would greatly improve the immersion. The models from the trailer were (if I remember a dev’s statement correctly) cut before the face-generator came into play. It would be nice if they weren’t lost and could return later or something.

Read full topic

Dotard:

If you are referring to Xen then it’s apparently being worked on, unless it’s another of your anti-BM comments.

To be fair, I liked BM a lot more on my replay. But there IS still no Xen. :freeman:

item.title: Features that didn't make the cut
item.dc:creator: Dotard
item.description:
Crypt19:

Co-Op. Wouldn’t this have fit better in the Got a Question thread?

Quite possibly, but it’s not like the devs are answering questions these days, and that one isn’t for discussion between posters, but a “poster asks, a dev answers” thread, so I do think at least. And yes, right; co-op.

Read full topic
